description:
Want to print a poster? PosteRazor cuts an image file into pieces and you can print then on your printer and glue them together to a poster. Easy FLTK based user interface. Uses FreeImage for image loading. Creates PDFs as output.
#### Features
* Input image formats:  
  BMP, DDS, Dr. Halo, GIF, ICO, IFF, JBIG, JPEG/JIF, KOALA, LBM, Kodak PhotoCD, PCX, PBM, PGM, PNG, PPM, PhotoShop PSD, Sun RAS, TARGA, TIFF, WBMP, XBM, XPM  
* Dimension Units:  
    m, mm, cm, inch, ft, pt(72th inch)
* Printer page layout:  
    DIN A4, DIN A3, Legal, Letter, Tabloid, set manually
    * The size limit for one page is 5 meters (16.4 feet), which is the maximum that PDF allows. 
* Three poster size options:
    * Absolute image size  
    * Size in pages
    * Image size in percent
    The final size of the poster is theoretically unlimited.
* Image tile overlapping
* PDF output
author: Alessandro Portale
